targetLine.text: Oh, Lord! W-w-what is he doing?

contextBefore.text: I often work to music and I noticed the baby responds to it as well. Specifically, Mozart. I blended Kevlar with carbyne for durability under duress and cotton for comfort. Interwoven with these fabrics are a mesh of tiny sensors that monitor the baby's physical properties.

contextAfter.text: Well, it's Mozart, Robert. Can you blame him? The important thing is that the suit and tracker anticipated the change and alerted you.
Oh, no. Cookies. I gotta get cookies!
You do not need cookies. As I learned quite painfully last night any solution involving cookies will inevitably result in the demon baby.
